The Chosen of Shar Objectives

Find the Dark Justiciar's Lair

Shadowheart has shown interest in finding the lair of the Dark Justiciar - an elite force dedicated to her goddess Shar. We found murals in the grove that seemed to depict an ancient order of Sharran warriors - the Dark Justiciars. Further signs of their presence - historical or otherwise - may lie elsewhere.
